Node.js Class at Geekdom

I started a 3 week course on node.js. I never really thought to learn it before thinking it was framework like emberjs and I would not have any need for it. After the first class I think I changed my mind. “One stack to rule them; all the new applications in PayPal are now being built using Node.js.” as quoted by the article below. Our next class will be going over express which is a web application framework for node. After I have some cool stuff to show I will post it here. Having a blast :)

Visit Node Site
